LanguageData.MakeChemfuelFromBamboo.label: make chemfuel from bamboo
LanguageData.MakeChemfuelFromBamboo.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by gasifying bamboo. \n\nMakes 35.
LanguageData.VG_MakeBiofuel.label: make biofuel from grains
LanguageData.VG_MakeBiofuel.description: Make a batch of biofuel by extracting biofuel from barley, corn, or beans. \n\nMakes 35.
LanguageData.MakeChocolatemilk.label: make chocomilk x4
LanguageData.Fruitdrink.label: make fruit drinks x4
LanguageData.Fruitdrink.description: Press fruit into a juicy drink.
LanguageData.BrewCoffee.label: brew garden coffees x4
LanguageData.BulkBrewCoffee.label: brew garden coffee x12
LanguageData.BrewTea.label: brew garden teas x2
LanguageData.BrewTea.description: Prepare tea leaves and brew them into cups of tea.
LanguageData.BulkBrewTea.label: brew garden tea x10
LanguageData.BulkBrewTea.description: Prepare bulk amounts of tea leaves and brew them into cups of tea.
LanguageData.BrewBarleyTea.label: brew barley teas x2
LanguageData.BrewBarleyTea.description: Prepare barley and brew it into cups of tea.
LanguageData.BulkBrewBarleyTea.label: brew barley tea x5
LanguageData.BulkBrewBarleyTea.description: Prepare bulk amounts of barley and brew it into cups of tea.
LanguageData.DisassembleWoodenWeapon.label: disassemble simple wooden weapons
LanguageData.DisassembleWoodenWeapon.description: Disassemble simple wooden weapons into useful resources.
LanguageData.MakeSilage.label: make silage
LanguageData.MakeSilage.description: Make silage from hay and raw grains. \n\nMakes 50.
LanguageData.MakebulkSilage.label: make silage x4
LanguageData.MakebulkSilage.description: Make large amounts silage from hay and raw grains. \n\nMakes 200.
LanguageData.VG_MakebulkKibble.label: make kibble x4
LanguageData.VG_MakebulkKibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants in bulk. \n\nMakes 200.
LanguageData.Stirfrymeal.label: cook four stir-fried meals
LanguageData.Stirfrymeal.description:
Cooks a stir-fried meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. 

Makes enough for 4 meals. 

Food Effects: Manipulation and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.Cookstewpot.label: cook eight pots of stew
LanguageData.Cookstewpot.description:
Slow cooks a pot of stew from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. 

Makes enough for 8 meals. 

Food Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.
LanguageData.Make_Hardtack.label: make hardtack
LanguageData.Make_Hardtack.description: Make hardtack, a simple type of biscuit. Tastes bland, but not offensive. Made from grains and but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.Make_HardtackBulk.label: make hardtack x4
LanguageData.Make_HardtackBulk.description: Make bulk hardtack, a simple type of biscuit. Tastes bland, but not offensive. Made from grains and lasts a long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.MakeBambooWood.label: convert bamboo into wood
LanguageData.MakeBambooWood.description: convert bamboo into wood. \n\n100 bamboo into 100 wood logs.
LanguageData.MakeIronWood.label: convert ironwood into woodlogs
LanguageData.MakeIronWood.description: convert ironwood into woodlogs. \n\n100 ironwood into 100 wood logs.
LanguageData.Makemead.label: make five honey mead drinks
LanguageData.Makemead.description: Press honey into mead by hand.
